subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey snapped a four-start winless streak, Melky Cabrera had four hits against his former team and the host Blue Jays beat the Giants, 10-6, on Tuesday.
snippet: R. A. Dickey snapped a four-start winless streak, Melky Cabrera had four hits against his former team and the host Blue Jays beat the Giants, 10-6, on Tuesday.
